name: PayPlus Gateway for WooCommerce
author: PayPlus

sections.description:
Accept Alipay, WeChat Pay, Credit Cards in one plugin for WooCommerce.

Country Restriction:
This plugin is created for merchants in New Zealand. The settlement currency is in NZD. Merchants need to open an account with PayPlus.

Short Introduction

Accept Alipay, WeChat Pay, Credit Cards in one plugin for WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
In WordPress -> Plugins menu, click “Add New”. In the search field, search by “PayPlus”.
Install and activate the plugin
Go to WooCommerce -> Setting, click “Settings”, select “Payment” tab.
Under this tab, you will find all the available gateways, select “PayPlus Payment Gateway” to do the payment settings. You can follow the below instructions:
Enable/Disable : Keep the “Enable/Disable” as “on” status (means you should tick it).
Title: PayPlus Payment Gateway.
Description: Your description will be displayed in checkout.
Gateway URL: This MUST be https://endeavour.payplus.co.nz
For sandbox testing, please enter:
https://endeavour-sandbox.payplus.co.nz
Shop URL: Your online shop link.

You may need the information about the merchant token and the secret key. Please refers to Q&A to apply our merchant account first.

If you have any problems about the installation or plugin files, you can contact us at support@payplusinc.com.
sections.faq:
Where can I find the merchant token and secret key?

Please contact PayPlus at sales@payplusinc.com to setup the merchant account. After we setup your merchant account, you will have the access to the merchant portal.

When will I recieve the settlement?

Our standard settlement time is two working days.

How do I process a refund

You can process the refund through our merchant portal.

1.0

1.0.2
